text: tae puok anak brachheang nung a l laoh yeang dauch me dch khn del puok anak mintean mean pimoun mk( mintean kaet) haey trong ban bangkeut puok anak aoy meanchivit kraoyomk trong aoy puok anak slab towvinh banteab mk trong thveu aoy puok anak rsa laengvinh( now thngai barlok) banteabmk tiet puok anak nung trauv vilotralb tow champoh trong vinh noh
